<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>P</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>Team A wins a single game against Team B</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>51</mn>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">%<!-- % --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">P({\text{Team A wins a single game against Team B}}) = 51\% </annotation></semantics></math> best-of-5 series

questionSetStimulus: The following exercises are about series of games, where Team A faces Team B in a best-of series (like the World Series). Find the probability that Team A wins the series in each of the following scenarios:
